overview: Alex furnishes years of networking experience which has opened many doors for Pearescope. Actively involved in several professional and social organizations, including Cornell University related groups, Alex adds value with his Rolodex. With an Ivy League degree from Cornell University and Juris Doctor from Brooklyn Law School, Alex maintains strong ties to his Alma Maters and alumni networks. Alex served as an Assistant District Attorney in New York City where he prosecuted major criminal cases on behalf of New York State. Alex currently consults for major law firms while tasked with generating millions of dollars in annual revenue selling complex high-dollar legal technology and services.
